-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Nicer interface to regex-pcre.
--   
--   Uses regex-pcre to provide substitution, backrefs. Uses '`' over
--   <a>\\</a> just to be idiosyncratic. (It's prettier.) See the tests for
--   more information.
@package pcre-less
@version 0.2.1

module Text.Regex.Less.REOpts
reCtOpts :: [RECtOpts] -> CompOption
data RECtOpts
CtAnchored :: RECtOpts
CtAutoCallout :: RECtOpts
CtBlank :: RECtOpts
CtCaseless :: RECtOpts
CtDollarEndOnly :: RECtOpts
CtDotAll :: RECtOpts
CtExtended :: RECtOpts
CtExtra :: RECtOpts
CtFirstLine :: RECtOpts
CtMultiLine :: RECtOpts
CtNoAutoCapture :: RECtOpts
CtNoUtf8Check :: RECtOpts
CtUtf8 :: RECtOpts
CtUngreedy :: RECtOpts
reRtOpts :: [RERtOpts] -> ExecOption
data RERtOpts
RtAnchored :: RERtOpts
RtBlank :: RERtOpts
RtNoUtf8Check :: RERtOpts
RtNotBol :: RERtOpts
RtNotEol :: RERtOpts
RtNotEmpty :: RERtOpts
RtPartial :: RERtOpts

module Text.Regex.Less.Quackers
class QLR a
compile :: QLR a => a -> Regex
execute :: QLR a => a -> String -> [MatchArray]
instance QLR (String, ([RERtOpts], [RECtOpts]))
instance QLR (String, ([RECtOpts], [RERtOpts]))
instance QLR ((String, [RERtOpts]), [RECtOpts])
instance QLR ((String, [RECtOpts]), [RERtOpts])
instance QLR (String, [RERtOpts])
instance QLR (String, [RECtOpts])
instance QLR String

module Text.Regex.Less
(=~) :: QLR a => String -> a -> Match
(<<) :: a -> b -> (a, b)
truth :: Match -> Bool
subs :: Match -> String -> String
subg :: Match -> String -> String
derefs :: (Int -> String) -> String -> String
bref :: Match -> Int -> String
matchN :: Match -> Int -> Match
